name: Apps
description:
DesktopIcons - Renders draggable app icons on the desktop.

This component displays all registered apps as draggable icons on the desktop surface.
Features include:

- Drag and drop to reposition icons
- Click to launch apps
- Keyboard navigation (Enter/Space to launch)
- Respects icon size preference (small/large)
- Shows/hides titles based on user preference

This component is used internally by Shell's desktop variant.

name: IFrameApp
description:
Reusable component for wrapping standalone web apps with an iframe inside a Window.
Enables external apps to run within the desktop environment.

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the external app to embed

props.name: title
props.description: Title displayed in the window header

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon displayed next to the title

name: Search
description:
Search - A spotlight-style search overlay for finding and launching apps.

The Search component provides a quick way to find and launch applications
in the desktop environment. Features include:

- Real-time filtering as you type
- Shows running state for open apps
- Click to open new app or focus existing window
- Escape key to close
- Backdrop click to close

This component is used internally by Shell's desktop variant.

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the search overlay is open

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback to close the search overlay

props.name: appStates
props.description: Map of app IDs to their open state

props.name: openApp
props.description: Callback to open an app by ID

props.name: focusApp
props.description: Map of app IDs to their focus functions

props.name: apps
props.description: List of available apps to search

examples.title: Example
examples.code:
<Search
  open={searchOpen}
  onClose={() => setSearchOpen(false)}
  appStates={windowStates}
  openApp={openApp}
  focusApp={focusFunctions}
  apps={allApps}
/>

name: Settings
description:
Settings - Desktop environment settings application.

A built-in settings app that allows users to customize the desktop experience:

- **Icon Size**: Choose between small (with titles) or large (without titles) icons
- **Theme**: Light, dark, or system preference
- **Dock**: Show or auto-hide the dock
- **Desktop Layout**: Grid snap or free placement for icons
- **Wallpaper**: Choose from color presets or upload a custom image

This component is automatically included in Shell's desktop variant.

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Whether the settings window is open

props.name: handleClose
props.description: Callback when the window is closed

props.name: zIndex
props.description: Z-index for window stacking

props.name: onFocus
props.description: Callback when window receives focus

props.name: resetKey
props.description: Key to reset window position/size

name: Shell
description:
Shell.Item - Defines a page within the Shell component.
Used as children of Shell to create navigable pages.

props.name: variant
props.description: The layout variant to use

props.name: backgroundImage
props.description: Background image URL (desktop variant)

props.name: backgroundOverlay
props.description: CSS class for background overlay (desktop variant)

props.name: customApps
props.description: Custom apps to display in the desktop environment (desktop variant)

props.name: url
props.description: URL to embed in iframe (web variant)

props.name: webTitle
props.description: Title for the iframe (web variant)

props.name: windowTitle
props.description: Title displayed in window header (window variant)

props.name: windowHandleClose
props.description: Callback when window is closed (window variant)

props.name: windowIsOpen
props.description: Whether the window is open (window variant)

props.name: windowZIndex
props.description: Z-index for window stacking (window variant)

props.name: windowOnFocus
props.description: Callback when window receives focus (window variant)

props.name: windowResetKey
props.description: Key to reset window position/size (window variant)

props.name: headerVariant
props.description: Header component variant override

props.name: footerVariant
props.description: Footer component variant override

props.name: mainVariant
props.description: Main content area variant override

props.name: headerContent
props.description: Content to render inside the header

props.name: footerContent
props.description: Content to render inside the footer

props.name: mainContent
props.description: Content to render in the main area

props.name: header
props.description: Full header component override

props.name: footer
props.description: Full footer component override

props.name: main
props.description: Full main content component override

props.name: sidebar
props.description: Sidebar component (sidebar variant)

props.name: sidebarContent
props.description: Alias for sidebar prop

props.name: menuItems
props.description: Navigation menu items (legacy)

props.name: pages
props.description: Page content map keyed by page ID (legacy)

props.name: defaultPageId
props.description: Default active page ID (legacy)

props.name: onPageChange
props.description: Callback when active page changes

props.name: navigationItems
props.description: Navigation menu items

props.name: defaultActivePageId
props.description: Default active page ID

props.name: isMainScrollable
props.description: Whether main content area is scrollable

props.name: isScrollable
props.description: Alias for isMainScrollable

props.name: isSidebarScrollable
props.description: Whether sidebar is scrollable (sidebar variant)

name: Window
description:
Window - A draggable, resizable window component with glassmorphism styling.

Features:
- Drag to move by clicking and dragging the title bar
- Resize by dragging the bottom-right corner
- Maximize to fill the viewport (below header)
- Fullscreen mode to cover entire screen
- Double-click title bar to maximize/restore
- Close, maximize, and fullscreen buttons

props.name: title
props.description: Title displayed in the window header

props.name: handleClose
props.description: Callback when the window close button is clicked

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render inside the window

props.name: isOpen
props.description: Whether the window is visible

props.name: zIndex
props.description: Z-index for window stacking order

props.name: onFocus
props.description: Callback when the window receives focus

props.name: resetKey
props.description: Key to reset window position and size to defaults

examples.title: Basic usage
examples.code:
setIsOpen(false)} zIndex={1} onFocus={() => bringToFront()} >
Window content here

examples.title: With custom title
examples.code: My App} isOpen={true} handleClose={handleClose} zIndex={zIndex} onFocus={onFocus} >
